\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 93653}

\subsection*{Three Milligrams, Eight Hours}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{hitman}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 3 mg & oral & 2C-P & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 80.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
3 mg of 2C-P is awesome, like a good trip for any kind of music, prefer psy, mild visuals, good results from everyone who took a dose of 3mg, 8hrs trip. Mood like good MDMA, makes me talk, laugh, dance, keeps me fresh after the trip, almost better then acid.



During the course I need to eat food and drink water on time to handle the trip and to keep the brain  healthy.



6 mg is psychedelic, 12hrs



12 mg is also good it's like a 20 hrs trip
